welcome_message_body: Welcome to Delhi, the vibrant capital of India known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and delicious street food. Take in the charm of this bustling city and immerse yourself in its culture as you explore and enjoy all that it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Handles domestic flights for low-cost carriers such as IndiGo and SpiceJet.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Handles international flights for airlines such as Air India and Vistara.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Handles both domestic and international flights for major airlines such as Jet Airways and Emirates.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
